${ModID}:FlickDice.NAME: Flick Dice
${ModID}:FlickDice.DESCRIPTION: {@@}造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Roll a ${ModID}:D6.
${ModID}:FlickDice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Roll a ${ModID}:D8.

${ModID}:ThrowChips.NAME: Throw Chips
${ModID}:ThrowChips.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to a random enemy NL X times. NL ${ModID}:Reroll.

${ModID}:PocketAce.NAME: PocketAce
${ModID}:PocketAce.DESCRIPTION: {@@}抽 !M! 张牌。 NL Discard !${ModID}:m2! cards. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Reroller.NAME: Reroller
${ModID}:Reroller.DESCRIPTION: {@@}获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL ${ModID}:Reroll.

${ModID}:PerceptionCheck.NAME: Perception Check
${ModID}:PerceptionCheck.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, roll a ${ModID}:D8.

${ModID}:AllIn.NAME: All In
${ModID}:AllIn.DESCRIPTION: {@@}造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 抽 !M! 张牌。 NL 获得 !M! [E] . NL Skip your next turn. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:D20.NAME: D20!
${ModID}:D20.DESCRIPTION: Roll a [#efc851]D20[] with ${ModID}:Advantage. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:GoToJail.NAME: Go to Jail
${ModID}:GoToJail.DESCRIPTION: Go directly to ${ModID}:Jail. NL Do not pass Go. NL Do not collect $200.
${ModID}:GoToJail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Go directly to ${ModID}:Jail. NL Do not pass Go. NL Collect $20.

${ModID}:BoardGameKeywordManager.NAME: KeywordManager
${ModID}:BoardGameKeywordManager.DESCRIPTION: Stuff for translations and easy access to keyword ids
